trans-unit.source: Contains information about the reason that a workflow instance was suspended.
trans-unit.target: Contient des informations sur la raison de l'interruption d'une instance de workflow.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs> is generated by the runtime tracking infrastructure when a workflow instance is suspended.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs> est généré par l'infrastructure de suivi d'exécution lorsqu'une instance de workflow est interrompue.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with a workflow instance includes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configured for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>, then the workflow tracking infrastructure puts a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs> in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> that it sends to the Tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Si le <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associé à une instance de workflow inclut un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configuré pour un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>, l'infrastructure de suivi de workflow met un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs> dans <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> dans le <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> qu'elle envoie au service de suivi.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs> is used only by the runtime tracking service to pass information in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs> est utilisé uniquement par le service de suivi d'exécution pour passer des informations dans un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.

trans-unit.source: The data for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is passed in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowSuspendedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Les données pour un événement <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=nameWithType> sont passées dans un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowSuspendedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a method, named `WriteSuspendedEventArgs`, which captures a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: L'exemple de code suivant montre une méthode, nommée `WriteSuspendedEventArgs`, qui capture un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The code writes information from the method's arguments to the console, including the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs.Error%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Le code écrit des informations des arguments de la méthode sur la console, y compris la valeur de la propriété <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowSuspendedEventArgs.Error%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the EventArgs Tracking SDK Sample from the Program.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Cet exemple de code fait partie de l'exemple du Kit de développement EventArgs Tracking (SDK) et provient du fichier Program.cs.

trans-unit.source: Contains information about the reason that a workflow instance was suspended.
trans-unit.target: Contient des informations sur la raison de l'interruption d'une instance de workflow.

trans-unit.source: This can come from the <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend(System.String)" /> (string error) or the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity.Error" /> property that you set on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity" /> activity.
trans-unit.target: Ces informations peuvent provenir du <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend(System.String)" /> (erreur de chaîne) ou de la propriété <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity.Error" /> que vous définissez sur l'activité <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: String value that contains the reason that a workflow instance was suspended.
trans-unit.target: Valeur de chaîne qui contient la raison de l'interruption d'une instance de workflow.
